languages.text: Губернатор счастлив слышать, что вы знакомы с Руолдо. Он — его дальний родственник. Раз Вольный Торговец друг Руолдо — значит, и губернатору Идекса друг!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
languages.original_text: Губернатор счастлив слышать, что вы знакомы с Руолдо. Он — его дальний родственник. Раз Вольный Торговец друг Руолдо — значит, и губернатору Идекса друг!

traits.locale_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!
The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

languages.text: Der Gouverneur freut sich, dass du Ruoldo kennst, der ein entfernter Verwandter von ihm ist. Da {mf|der Freihändler ein Freund von Ruoldo ist, ist er auch ein Freund|die Freihändlerin eine Freundin von Ruoldo ist, ist sie auch eine Freundin} des Gouverneurs von Idex!
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: Der Gouverneur freut sich, dass du Ruoldo kennst, der ein entfernter Verwandter von ihm ist. Da {mf|der Freihändler ein Freund von Ruoldo ist, ist er auch ein Freund|die Freihändlerin eine Freundin von Ruoldo ist, ist sie auch eine Freundin} des Gouverneurs von Idex!

languages.text: Le gouverneur est ravi d'apprendre que vous connaissez Ruoldo, qui est l'un de ses lointains parents. Les amis de Ruoldo sont les amis du gouverneur d'Idex !
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: Le gouverneur est ravi d'apprendre que vous connaissez Ruoldo, qui est l'un de ses lointains parents. Les amis de Ruoldo sont les amis du gouverneur d'Idex !

languages.text: 総督は、あなたが彼の遠縁にあたるルオルドを知っていると聞いて喜んだ。ルオルドの友であるということは、ローグトレーダーがイデックスの総督の友でもあるということだ！
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: 総督は、あなたが彼の遠縁にあたるルオルドを知っていると聞いて喜んだ。ルオルドの友であるということは、ローグトレーダーがイデックスの総督の友でもあるということだ！

languages.text: Al gobernador le alegra saber que conoces a Ruoldo, que es su pariente lejano. ¡Los amigos de Ruoldo son amigos del gobernador de Idex, Comerciantes Independientes incluidos!
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: Al gobernador le alegra saber que conoces a Ruoldo, que es su pariente lejano. ¡Los amigos de Ruoldo son amigos del gobernador de Idex, Comerciantes Independientes incluidos!

languages.text: 总督听说你认识他的远房亲戚罗尔多，非常开心。既然行商浪人是罗尔多的朋友，那也同样是艾德克斯总督的朋友！
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: 总督听说你认识他的远房亲戚罗尔多，非常开心。既然行商浪人是罗尔多的朋友，那也同样是艾德克斯总督的朋友！

languages.text: Vali, uzaktan akrabası Ruoldo'yu tanıdığını duyunca çok seviniyor. Ruoldo'nun arkadaşı olduğuna göre İdex valisi de Hür Tacir'in arkadaşı sayılır!
languages.original_text: The governor is glad to hear that you know Ruoldo, who is his distant relative. Being a friend to Ruoldo makes the Rogue Trader a friend to the governor of Idex!

traits.locale_text: Vali, uzaktan akrabası Ruoldo'yu tanıdığını duyunca çok seviniyor. Ruoldo'nun arkadaşı olduğuna göre İdex valisi de Hür Tacir'in arkadaşı sayılır!
